text:
Hi really appreciated the meeting yesterday, after going thinking things through I dont think I can hit the level of animation polish required for previs as it will take quite a ong time to get to that level. So I am going to carry on persuing concept work as I have poured a lot of hours into and in all honesty that what I like doing.

Thank you once again and I will be sharing my concept work with you as I complete them and hopefully with your help I can get a job doing this.
